::Triggerhappy::

       Triggerhappy yanks Condor out with him from the hatch, then puts him
on the ground.  Blowpipe turns back into Triggerhappy's compressed air
cannon.  He kicks Condor in the side, and points Blowpipe at Condor.

        "You make one move, you die!" He said.

         Triggerhappy was getting eager to start firing his guns at the
enemy.  Of course, the 'GRID' option was even dandier.
